definition: a unit of information equal to 1024 mebibytes or 2^30 i.e. 1,073,741,824 bytes
details:
noun
- a unit of information equal to 1024 mebibytes or 2^30 i.e. 1,073,741,824 bytes
= example: a unit of information equal to 1024 mebibytes or 2^30 i.e. 1,073,741,824 bytes
= synonyms: gibibyte
- a unit of information equal to 1000 megabytes, or 1,000,000,000 bytes
= example: a unit of information equal to 1000 megabytes, or 1,000,000,000 bytes
